title: Petition: Do not remove LGBT content from the Relationships Education curriculum

last_post.content:
I am going to keep posting about this until we get to 100,000 signatures.

So,you have seen posts like this before and you are getting bored of seeing it. However, the rate of increase in the number of votes is decreasing. I know we can do this, so please help me out.

As I write there are 87,960 signatures. The linear trend line of signatures from Tuesday 31 January gives an equation of
y = 1076.9x + 82277.
That means the date for hitting 100,000 votes has drifted out three days to Wednesday 15 February. I know we can do better than this. The last we thing we want is the petition to remove LGBT content from the curriculum to be debated and our opinion not to be heard.

Please sign if you are in the UK and please boost if you are not.

May I take this opportunity to thank each and everyone of the 900 people that have boosted this post so far. ❤️ ❤️

title: WHO keeps highest alert over COVID three years on

last_post.content:
WHY WE'RE NOT POST-COVID

No, the pandemic is not over. The World Health Organization says we're still in a pandemic. WHO declared the public health emergency on 30 January 2020 and a pandemic on 11 March 2020, and it's the entity that gets to decide it's over--not you, me, or President Biden. Days ago, WHO held a meeting to discuss COVID, and it determined the pandemic remains a public health emergency of international concern.
https://www.euronews.com/next/2023/01/30/who-to-keep-highest-alert-over-covid-as-public-health-emergency-of-international-concern

title: Breaking News, Analysis, Politics, Blogs, News Photos, Video, Tech Reviews - TIME.com

last_post.content:
@mekkaokereke

True story: In the late 80s in rural upstate New York I went to the drive-in theater with a bunch of friends. There was enough of us we took two cars.

During the double feature we spent around four hours passing the bong back and forth between the cars, laughing and generally being rowdy young people.

The next day the loss prevention officer at the drug store where I worked asked me if I'd done anything the night before... just basic friendly break room chat.

I mentioned the drive-in, at which point he burst out laughing - "I thought that was you!" He and a STATE TROOPER friend were parked behind us, watching our very illegal frivolity. They laughed it off, and that was the end of the conversation.

Every time I see someone dismissing or downplaying white privilege, I think of this story. If I had been arrested then, my life and career prospects would have been destroyed.

See https://content.time.com/time/nation/article/0,8599,1888864,00.html for an idea of what drug laws were like in NY in the 80s.

title: Harvard Misinformation Expert Joan Donovan Forced to Leave by Kennedy School Dean, Sources Say | News | The Harvard Crimson

last_post.content:
Harvard is shutting down prominent misinformation expert Joan Donovan's project, forcing her out of her research director position. The project has a team >25 people—led by Donovan since 2019.

Donovan was told that her prominence led to the Dean's decision to remove her. The Center Director said in an email that the decision "was 'solely driven' by [the] policy of only allowing full professors to lead research projects."
